context_bundle.summary: Sealed Secrets is a Kubernetes controller and tool for one-way encrypted Secrets that can be safely stored in Git

onboarding.quick_start: Initialize Sealed Secrets Kubernetes, configure basic setup, and follow best practices for deployment and management
